ValidationRule.description: Enter new contact information if an Existing Contact is not selected
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: and( Contact__c ='', RecordTypeId !=$Label.BGA_Honeywell_Prospect, $Profile.Name != 'Portal API User RO Automation', Not Contains( $Profile.Name, 'Admin'), Email = '', Primary_Fax_Number__c ='', Primary_Work_Number__c ='' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter any one of the following items: Primary Email or Primary Work Number or Primary Fax Number in "New Account or Contact Information" section for the Contact.
